message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $100?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $125.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle at $110?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $122.50.
